message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. This is a great deal, considering its value to me is at least $12000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $10000 is a significant amount, but I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13000. This is a compromise that I think is fair, considering its value to me. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am still unable to meet you at $13000. I would like to propose $12000 as my maximum offer for the product.
